action_annotation: Tape a lid paper and a bottom paper to the cardboard to secure them in place.

instruction_label: Check the color of the mixed liquid by shining a black light on it to see if it turns white.
action_annotation: Check the color of the mixed liquid by shining a black light on it to see if it turns white.

instruction_label: Turn on the switch S1.
action_annotation: Turn on the switch S1.

instruction_label: Make incisions on the auxiliary lines of the fold on the paper.
action_annotation: Make incisions on the auxiliary lines of the fold on the paper.

instruction_label: Turn on the switch S1.
action_annotation: Turn on the switch S1.

instruction_label: Make incisions on the auxiliary lines of the fold on the paper.
action_annotation: Make incisions on the auxiliary lines of the fold on the paper.

instruction_label: Pour about 15mL of water into a cup, dip the tip of a red highlighter in the water and squeeze out a drop.
action_annotation: Pour about 15mL of water into a cup, dip the tip of a red highlighter in the water and squeeze out a drop.

instruction_label: Lay one blue thick cuboid block down and stack it in the upper center of the yellow and the red bhick cuboid blocks.
action_annotation: Lay one blue thick cuboid block down and stack it in the upper center of the yellow and the red bhick cuboid blocks.

instruction_label: Check the color of the mixed liquid by shining a black light on it to see if it turns white.
action_annotation: Check the color of the mixed liquid by shining a black light on it to see if it turns white.

instruction_label: Make incisions on the auxiliary lines of the fold.
action_annotation: Make incisions on the auxiliary lines of the fold.

instruction_label: Leave the ends of the liner for gluing.
action_annotation: Leave the ends of the liner for gluing.

instruction_label: Cut along the auxiliary lines of the shape on the paper.
action_annotation: Cut along the auxiliary lines of the shape on the paper.

instruction_label: Tape a lid paper and a bottom paper to the cardboard to secure them in place.
action_annotation: Tape a lid paper and a bottom paper to the cardboard to secure them in place.

instruction_label: Make a cross-shaped incision in the lid.
action_annotation: Make a cross-shaped incision in the lid.
